examples.korean: Our team came a close second. 발음듣기 우리 팀이 아깝게[1위와 거의 차이가 안 나는] 2위를 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our team came a close second. 발음

examples.korean: He was pipped at/to the post for the top award. 발음듣기 그는 1등상을 근소한 차이로[아깝게] 빼앗겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was pipped at/to the post for the top award. 발음

examples.korean: We lost by a neck in this match. 발음듣기 이번 경기는 정말 아깝게 졌다. Neungyule
examples.english: We lost by a neck in this match. 발음

examples.korean: He was narrowly beaten in the finals. 발음듣기 그는 결승전에서 아깝게 패했다 Neungyule
examples.english: He was narrowly beaten in the finals. 발음

examples.korean: The loss entailed no regret on[upon] him. 발음듣기 그는 손실을 아깝게 여기지 않았다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The loss entailed no regret on[upon] him. 발음
